moves.1. e4:
Being A Bully

I like this one, even though its against a lower rated opponent, especially since he got his revenge in the return!
moves.1... e6 2. d4 d5 3. exd5 exd5 4. Qe2+ Ne: A bit of an unusual opening, but now getting into my stride.
moves.6... h6 7. Nf3 f6 8. O-O-O b6: Little or no development from black, he needed to do more with the centre.
moves.9. Qd3 Bb7 10. g3 g5 11. Be3 g4 12. Nh4: I'm already aware of the weakness at g6, just trying to work things around so I can do summat with it.
moves.13... Nd7: Now comes black's development but this move does him no favours, blocking off the escape route for the king.
moves.15. a4 Bb7 16. Bf4 Rg7: And thats the move which starts the casacde!
moves.17. Bxh6 Rf7 18. Bxf8 Rxf8 19. Bxd5 c6 2: And yes I know its a bit brutal, but he gets his revenge trust me!
